doc.title: Bayalu Dari
doc.plot: Chandra, a rich estate owner's daughter falls in love with Gopu, a confirmed 'Romeo'. Gopu, in order to erase his bad image joins the army. He is believed killed in a plane crash. Chandra who carries Gopu's child in her womb, leaves her hearth, meets Katyayini, the girl who had been discarded by her brother. Following much stress and strain, Chandra is united with Gopu and her brother Raja takes up Katyayini as his wife.
